amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease the funding included in the Interior and Environment Appropriations Act for the Environmental Protection Agency by 38% to reduce spending to 2009 levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 111-184 to decrease the funding included in the Interior and Environment Appropriations Act for the Environmental Protection Agency by 38% to reduce spending to 2009 levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 261 (Roll no. 469).
